user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Emily (emily@communityunited.org), the head of non-profit to discuss how we can boost our donation effort. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["emily@communityunited.org"],"subject":"Exploring New Ways to Boost Donations for Community United","body":"Hi Emily,

I hope you’re doing well. I was inspired by the energy and success of your recent fundraising gala and would love to keep that momentum going as we look for ways to strengthen our donation efforts.

Based on some recent brainstorming, a few opportunities stand out:

1. Establishing a recurring-donor program that makes it simple for supporters to contribute automatically each month.
2. Launching an enhanced recognition approach—such as brief spotlight stories on social channels or a small appreciation package—to thank donors and keep them engaged over time.
3. Creating a week-long social-media challenge that encourages younger community members to share why they support Community United and invite friends to give.

I’d welcome your thoughts on these ideas and any others you’re considering. If it sounds useful, could we set up a short call next week to compare notes and map out next steps?

Thanks for everything you and your team continue to do, and I look forward to collaborating again.

Warm regards,
John"}
